name: Genuine Parts Company
summary: Genuine Parts Company is a leading distributor of automotive and industrial replacement parts, operating globally with its automotive segment serving around 9,800 retail locations, primarily under the NAPA Auto Parts brand, and its industrial segment operating under the Motion banner. Founded in 1928 and headquartered in Atlanta, the company employs approximately 63,000 people and serves both professional and retail customers through a vast network of distribution centers and stores.
